songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
It’s Britney, bitch!

[Verse 1]
Yeah I’m postin’ with ya momma
And ya sista
And ya motherfuckin’ granny
Feelin’ so dandy
Man I’m sweet like candy
But I’m a Savage like Randy
Ya girl gettin’ handsy
Tryna hit the beach get Sandy
With the V-Sop Brandy
Boy, you a pansy!
I hit ya mom in the pantry
Gravy get it steamy like Stanley!

[Chorus]
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)

[Verse 2]
Now she won’t get off my jock
Had to finesse like I’m Brock
I got that drip from my walk
I got yo side bitch on lock
I always roll with a flock
Got the herbs with the spices
Stole ya girl that’s a crisis
Had the pineapple slices
Just got my finesse license
Make a real cold like Tyson
Gravy so enticing
I knock yo ass out, Mike Tyson
I’m quick like lightning
Bitch thicker than a fuckin’ bison
I cover up the booty with icing
(Whoa!)
Gravy pulled up on yo ho
I’m like the Pillsbury Dough
I’m always cooking up, cooking up slow

[Chorus]
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)

[Verse 3]
Bitch, I run the game
Y’all motherfuckers barely joggin’
(Joggin’!)
Chillin, with yo momma, getting head
I’m gettin’ noggin’
(That noggin’!)
Jumpin’ over haters like I’m fuckin’ Leap Froggers
(Froggers!)
Slide up in yo bitch DM’s
Just like a toboggan
Bitch that’s icy!
(Icy!)
Gravy all over my Nike’s
(Splash!)
Pull up with the god damn sauce
Know that shit spicy
Look at my dab
I look like yo Dad
Cause I’m postin’ with ya mother
Finessin’ it under the covers
I might just sing like I’m Usher
(Baby!)
Gravy make it splash fruit Gushers
(Splash!)
Gravy come through finesse the food up out yo supper
(Bang!)
(Gravy Train!)

[Chorus]
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)
I just fucked yo bitch
In some Louis V Crocs
(Crocs!)
She couldn’t resist
Cause I wore em’ with the socks
(The socks!)

[Outro]
Gimme more
Gimme more
(More)
Gimme more
Gimme more, babe
songs.title: Louie V Crocs
